title: Accused Mastermind of 1MDB Close to Civil Settlement With DOJ
text:
The Justice Department is close to a civil-forfeiture settlement with Jho Low, a Malaysian businessman-turned-fugitive who stands accused of masterminding a multibillion-dollar fraud involving Malaysia’s sovereign-wealth fund.

The settlement is expected to be finalized in federal court in California in the coming days, according to people familiar with the matter. It would likely result in Mr. Low forfeiting nearly $1 billion in assets, though the amount hasn’t been finalized, the people said.
